name: SIX BY TWO
description:
Created for GMTK Game Jam 2022
 Complete small puzzle levels as a little  "board-game" dice that gets divided every time it moves. Combine with other dice on the board to become bigger and stronger. Controls: WASD or arrows - for moving the dice esc - for pausing Credits: Twist - programming, level design YAFF - composing, sound design, graphics, level design
